value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|That's it! We've found the arcanist's
manor. We can perform the rite!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Commander Anna! Wait! Look... $k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|There...you are.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Now...die... I...will kill...you all.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Something's wrong with him. It's like
he's not even the same person.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I will kill you! You, prince of Askr!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Grr...ugh.$k$pI lost... Now kill me...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You helped us, once. I have no
intention of taking your life here. $k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|You'll live to regret letting me off so
easy...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Alfonse, Sharena...come here.
Everything is ready. We can begin
the rite.$k$p$EFace_Anger|"With all thy heart, yearn for me.
With all thy voice, call to me."$k$p$EFace_Cool|Concentrate. Zacharias is
out there somewhere! Call to him...
With all your heart and soul! Now!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Zacharias! Zacharias! Answer us...
please!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're wasting your breath.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Why isn't anything happening?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Shout as much as you like. You won't
get a reply.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|You lie! The rite won't fail us!$k$pIf Zacharias is alive, he should be
able to talk with us, no matter where
he is—even asleep!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|There's your problem: "if."$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|What do you mean? Wait. You—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Prince Bruno...$k$pIs he dead? Answer me! Tell me what
you know!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|He stuck his nose into things that he
really should not have. Right before I
came here...$k$pI killed him.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|You what?!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|What was it I just told you? Oh, yes. I
said you'd regret your decision to let
me live.$k$pIt's time for me to go, however.
Alfonse. Sharena. There's something
you need to understand. You're next.$k$pI'll send you to meet your Zacharias.
One by one. Look forward to it.$k$p$Sbs150|
